price: Ndio kama hivyo tunavyo zipambanua Ishara, kwa kutaraji kuwa watarejea.
footnotes: Kwa mfano wa maelezo wazi yenye hikima tunawabainishia wanaadamu dalili za kuwepo Mwenyezi Mungu, ili warejee waache ukhalifu wao na kuwafuata wapotovu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
